- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Bala, Please see below ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Bala Kalyanaraman [mailto:balak_42@yahoo.com] Sent: Friday, April 26, 2013 3:44 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Welcome Back to MBO! Hi Sara,
Can you provide me the details pleaseCompany Name: MBO Partners, Inc.Company Address: 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive, 3rd Floor, Herndon, VA 20171Fed Tax ID: 22-2609042Signatory Name: Sara CondeSignatory Title: Consultant Services Advisor Signatory Email ID: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> The consulting firm with whom I am dealing with need this info.
Thanks, Bala
--- On Fri, 4/26/13, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> Subject: Welcome Back to MBO! To: "balak_42@yahoo.com <mailto:balak_42@yahoo.com>" <balak_42@yahoo.com <mailto:balak_42@yahoo.com>> Date: Friday, April 26, 2013, 1:13 PMDear Bala, Welcome back to MBO! Please consider me your point of contact and follow the steps below to complete your re-enrollment. - Log in to the MBO site www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVBVtExJv665O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Click the Enrollment link once you are logged in - Confirm contact information - Print out I-9 at the end of the enrollment - You will sign/date section 1 and local notary will sign/date section 2 (most people visit their local bank.) Please email or fax back to MBO (we do not need an original copy.) If you use a US passport as supporting documentation I will need an image of it to comply with E-Verify (most people just take a picture with their phone and then email it to me.) - Send me your clients contact information (name, email, phone number) and I will reach out to get a contract in place. - The link to my private page can be found here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVBVtExJv665O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> there are lots of great resources on this page and I encourage you to bookmark it. Please contact me with any questions. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVBVtExJv665O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVBVtExJv665O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVBVtExJv665O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVBVtExJv665O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
